content: OIL FIELD DISCOVERED IN IRAQ This past week, with little fanfare from the media and government officials, a U.S company, Heritage oil Corp, discovered a huge oil field in Iraqi Kurdistan, with a possible potential of 4.2 billion barrels. Great right? No mention of this by anyone. The liberal left, along with their media allies, want everyone to believe that oil is running out, but the truth is that there is oil out there and it is a matter of time when it is found.

title: MORE OIL IN IRAQ
